title: Futuristic Metal Compilation - Modern Melodic Death Metal
description:
Since the late '90s, melodic death metal bands have added more melodic choruses, riffs, clean vocals and have used keyboards more prominently than other death metal bands; their lyrics, unlike those of death metal, did not focus on death, violence, gore, horror, or blood for the most part.

Support Band if you can! Vistit us on facebook. Cheers F.A.K.K.3
